text: Antonio Valentín Angelillo (; 5 September 1937 – 5 January 2018) was an Argentine-born Italian football forward. He was born in Buenos Aires. He played the majority of his professional career in the Italian Serie A. He was a member of both the Argentine and the Italian national teams. Angelillo died on 5 January 2018 in Siena, Italy of lung cancer at the age of 80.Morto Angelillo, primatista di reti segnate in un campionato ==References== ==Other websites== *Inter Archive * Angelillo with Boca Juniors * Biography Category:1937 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Deaths from lung cancer Category:Cancer deaths in Italy Category:Italian footballers Category:Footballers from Buenos Aires
title: Antonio Valentín Angelillo
